Date to timestamps

Source: R/helpers.R
datetime_to_timestamp.Rd

Turn a date time vector to timestamp format

datetime_to_timestamp(dt)

Arguments

dt

Date or datetime vector

Examples


datetime_to_timestamp(
  as.Date(c("2015-05-08", "2015-09-12"),
    format = "%Y-%m-%d"
  )
)
#> [1] 1.431043e+12 1.442016e+12

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
